attributes.action: WORLD WIDE WHALE AND DOLPHIN HUNTING BAN MUST CONTINUE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop the Hunting and so called scientific research hunts which is a back door way of killing them! How does killing hundreds of whales in the name of research carry on in the year 2007...disgraceful. Please boycott Products and going to Japan like me. Please help the helpless.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
